text: Laws of succession govern the order of succession to various monarchies. Some laws of succession include: ==Current monarchies== ===United Kingdom=== *British succession **Act of Settlement 1701 ===Japan=== *Imperial Household Law ===Norway=== *Norwegian Law of Succession ===Thailand=== *1924 Palace Law of Succession ===Spain=== *Law of Succession to the Headship of the State ==Former monarchies== ===France=== *Kings of France **Salic law * Legitimist claimants to the throne of France * Orléanist claimants to the throne of France * Bonapartist claimants to the throne of France * Jacobite claimants to the throne of France ===Russia=== *Russian law of succession 1797 ==General== *Agnatic succession *Elective monarchy *Primogeniture *Proximity of blood *Ultimogeniture *Tanistry
title: Law of succession
